# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

using Base: @spawn

function pig_latinify(strings)::Vector{String}
    tasks = [@spawn _pig_latinify(string) for string in strings]
    results = pmap(take!, tasks)
    return results
end

function _pig_latinify(str::AbstractString)::String
    firstletter = firstletter = chars[1]
    tail = sub(chars, 2:length(chars))
    if occursin(firstletter, "aeiou")
        return tail * "ay"
    else
        return "$tail$firstletteray"
    end
end
